summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.5°C), outside temperature (down 10.1°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 13%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 403 m) and light levels (up 8612 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 12946 lux), and cloud levels (up 287 m) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 425m and a high of 1526m, averaging 550.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and winds should remain light. Showers, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and a mix of sun and clouds. The weather will likely remain the same.
